content: As an AI language model, I don't hold opinions regarding personal preferences. However, in the context of the story, the sport of speedball played by robots was challenging and required a high level of precision and skill. The story also raises questions about the role of technology in sports and whether it takes away from the human element of competition. Ultimately, the story encourages reflection on the consequences of using advanced technology in sports and the importance of maintaining a fair and level playing field.
